title: Chrome 112 Released With WASM Garbage Collection Trial, CSS Nesting
excerpt: Google today promoted the Chrome 112 web browser to their stable channel on all supported platforms. Phoronix reports:  Starting as an origin trial with Chrome 112 is WebAssembly (WASM) Garbage Collection support. Yes, garbage collection to allow for efficient support for high-level managed language...

title: CSS Object Model (CSSOM) - Web APIs | MDN
excerpt: The CSS Object Model is a set of APIs allowing the manipulation of CSS from JavaScript. It is much like the DOM, but for the CSS rather than the HTML. It allows users to read and modify CSS style dynamically.
